revised_title: Neurosecretion: Diverse Roles of Neurons in Endocrine Control
tldr: The author discusses the subcellular and macromolecular aspects of synaptic transmission, specifically focusing on neurosecretory neurons and their roles in endocrine control. The article highlights the similarities and differences between peptidergic and aminergic neurons, and proposes an extended definition of neurosecretion to include all neurons involved in endocrine control, either directly or indirectly.
